content.prompt: The pulse (beat) and subdivision of the beat are best described as

choices.label: two beats per measure with a duple subdivision of the beat
two beats per measure with a triple subdivision of the beat
three beats per measure with a duple subdivision of the beat
three beats per measure with a triple subdivision of the beat

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
